ValidationRule.description: A user can't close a patient case manually.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Consultation Completed - Pending CN") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Merged") ) && Not(ISCHANGED(Toggle__c)) && $RecordType.DeveloperName = "Patient_Case"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please close all related cases to close this case.
